summary: A washed-up luchador and a super-spy investigate Nazi zombies, a nefarious scientist, and a stripper with a Satanic birthmark.
cast: Joe Alaskey|Ken Foree|Sheri Moon Zombie|Tom Papa|Rosario Dawson|April Winchell|Tom Kenny|Dee Wallace|Laraine Newman|Cassandra Peterson|Jess Harnell|Harland Williams|Rob Paulsen|Debra Wilson|Tom Klein|Clint Howard|Brian Posehn|Dee Bradley Baker|Paul Giamatti|Geoffrey Lewis|John DiMaggio|Jeff Bennett|Danny Trejo|Carlos Alazraqui|Tura Satana|Bill Moseley|Rodger Bumpass|Sid Haig|Charlie Adler|Kevin Michael Richardson|Daniel Roebuck|Christopher Corey Smith|Zach Hanks|Ezra Weisz|Karen Strassman
title: The Haunted World of El Superbeasto
